Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which holds immense value for you at $12,000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I believe this is an opportunity not to be missed. I kindly invite you to consider purchasing this item at a special introductory price of $11,000, making it even more accessible for you. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of serving you with our top-tier product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $11,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $11,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
